column2: "In  this  case  clearly  the  principal  offence  was  riot.  Some  of the

column1: accused assembled  together with  the  sale  object of assaulting Mr.
Cane.  They  affected  their  purpose.  Riot  was
offence  they committed.  That act of riot again was made  up of two
other  offences,  unlawful  assembly  and  voluntarily  causing  hurt,

column2: which  was  the  object  of the  assembly.  They  therefore  should  only
the  principal  offence  of riot.  This  case  comes

column1: within the  provisions of section 67 of our Penal  Code./I
